Rationale.GT1_ModelGeneralization: Tested on Pythia-410m (not used in original study). At least one trial verified that universal neuron statistical signatures (negative input bias, high kurtosis activations) exist in the new model.
Rationale.GT2_DataGeneralization: Tested on new data not from Pile dataset: recent news, code, and multilingual text. At least one trial verified that neuron activation patterns hold on new data.
Rationale.GT3_MethodGeneralization: Tested if methods (weight statistics, vocab kurtosis, feature detection) generalize to other components (attention heads, embeddings). At least one trial verified method generalizability.
